channel.title: Making npc's attack back
channel.description: ok im having problems with an npc the "king black dragon" i made this area for a boss fight with him and he wont attack back i have tried a bunch of different things i cant get him to auto attack and i cant get him to attack ppl at all it would be cool if some1 could help and it accualy worked =)

item.title: Making npc's attack back
item.dc:creator: @Rufio Rufio
item.description:
@Rufio wrote:

ok im having problems with an npc the “king black dragon” i made this area for a boss fight with him and he wont attack back
i have tried a bunch of different things i cant get him to auto attack and i cant get him to attack ppl at all
it would be cool if some1 could help and it accualy worked =)
